function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preparedness plans in hospitals","Impact":"Difficulty in managing the crisis during the outbreak of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Develop and implement preparedness plans, train healthcare staff","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, virtual training platforms","People":"Nursing managers, healthcare staff","Owner":"Hospital administrators, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Rise in the number of infected nurses and physicians","Impact":"Increased strain on healthcare system, higher risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures, supply of PPE, regular testing","Technologies":"Telemedicine, contact tracing apps, PPE manufacturing","People":"Nurses, physicians, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital administrators, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Unprecedented professional, social, and psychological challenges for nurses","Impact":"Reduced efficiency, high stress, burnout, mental health issues","Mitigation":"Mental health support, stress management programs, flexible work schedules","Technologies":"Telepsychiatry, mental health apps, communication platforms","People":"Nurses, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital managers, mental health professionals"}]}
